Executive summary 
This Business Requirements Document (BRD) outlines the business needs identified during discussions with the 
Ajman Department of Human Resources  team in March  2025. The document focuses on the replacement of the 
current chatbot with a new, advanced solution aimed at enhancing employee interactions and improving overall 
operational efficiency.

Ajman Department of Human Resources   seeks to deploy a chatbot that integrates seamlessly with existing 
systems, supporting dynamic and accurate responses to user inquiries, with smooth transitions to human agents 
when necessary. The proposed solution, powered by ThingLogixCE, will streamline HR support processes, reduce 
operational costs, and offer key insights into employee behavior and service needs. 
Key business objectives include improving user satisfaction, expanding self-service capabilities, and aligning with 
Ajman Department of Human Resources’s long-term strategy of leveraging AI for more personalized and effective 
employee interactions.

Product Definition 
ThingLogixCE  is designed to deliver a modern and efficient chatbot platform, tailored to enhance the Ajman 
Department of Human Resources' ( AjmanHRD ) customer engagement. The primary goal is to replace the 
existing chatbot solution with one that provides real-time support for various HR-related inquiries, such as 
employee information, benefits management, leave requests, and other services. The new chatbot will 
seamlessly integrate with  AjmanHRD 's backend systems and chat channels (Web and Mobile), ensuring smooth 
communication.  
ThingLogixCE will work closely with multiple teams at  AjmanHRD , including IT, operations, and business units, to 
ensure successful delivery and deployment of the solution. The platform will include key features such as the 
design of conversation flows for HR services and integration with backend systems, allowing real-time access to 
essential HR data. 
By integrating advanced AI technologies, including Generative AI, ThingLogixCE will provide  AjmanHRD  with a 
scalable, intelligent chatbot solution that improves resource efficiency, enhances user satisfaction, and ensures a 
seamless customer journey across multiple channels.

The integration of the Ajman HRD chatbot with HR services will provide employees with a seamless and 
personalized experience. By connecting the chatbot with core HR functionalities, employees can access their leave 
balance , and other HR-related services in a secure and efficient manner. 
This integration will ensure that employees receive real-time, accurate information, reducing the dependency on 
HR personnel for routine queries while enhancing self-service capabilities. Additionally, a structured approval 
workflow will be implemented for critical actions, ensuring that managers and HR administrators have oversight 
where necessary.

To ensure only authorized users can access HR services through the chatbot, the solution will integrate with 
Ajman HRD’s existing portal authentication system. Employees will be required to log in via the portal before 
being granted access to any personal or sensitive HR-related information through the chatbot.
